迁移过程资源总额变化监控
CPU

panels.description: abs( 本日CPU利用率 - 昨日同时刻CPU利用率 )

targets.expr: abs(((1 - sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}) by (cpu))) * 100) - ((1 - sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d)) / count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}) by (cpu))) * 100))

stddev_over_time((((1 - sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}) by (cpu))) * 100) - ((1 - sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d)) / count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}) by (cpu))) * 100))[5m:$__rate_interval])

panels.title: CPU 利用率两日差值

options.content: System Load

list.definition:
select concat(timestampdiff(SECOND, created_at, now()) - 120, 's') as offset
from mig_implementation
where ip = left('$instance', locate(':', '$instance') - 1)
UNION ALL
select 0
from mig_implementation
where Not exists(
    select created_at from mig_implementation where  ip = left('$instance', locate(':', '$instance') - 1)
);
list.name: migration_offset
list.query:
select concat(timestampdiff(SECOND, created_at, now()) - 120, 's') as offset
from mig_implementation
where ip = left('$instance', locate(':', '$instance') - 1)
UNION ALL
select 0
from mig_implementation
where Not exists(
    select created_at from mig_implementation where  ip = left('$instance', locate(':', '$instance') - 1)
);
